table.name: vw_azimut_edit
table.viewSql: SELECT az.id, az._last_modification_date, az._last_modification_user, az.needs_validation, (st_makeline(su.geometry, st_setsrid(st_makepoint((st_x(su.geometry) + ((10)::double precision * sin(radians((az.azimut)::double precision)))), (st_y(su.geometry) + ((10)::double precision * cos(radians((az.azimut)::double precision))))), 2056)))::geometry(LineString,2056) AS geometry FROM (signalo_db.azimut az JOIN signalo_db.support su ON ((az.fk_support = su.id)));

ELSE ''::text END) || '.svg'::text) WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 14) THEN 'street-plate.svg'::text WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 15) THEN vl_user_sign.img_fr ELSE NULL::text END AS _img_fr, CASE WHEN (sign.complex IS TRUE) THEN 'complex.svg'::text WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 11) THEN vl_official_sign.img_it WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 12) THEN vl_marker_type.img_it WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 13) THEN ((('mirror'::text || CASE WHEN (sign.fk_mirror_shape = 12) THEN '-circular'::text ELSE ''::text END) || CASE WHEN (NOT sign.mirror_red_frame) THEN '-noframe'::text ELSE ''::text END) || '.svg'::text) WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 14) THEN 'street-plate.svg'::text WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 15) THEN vl_user_sign.img_it ELSE NULL::text END AS _img_it, CASE WHEN (sign.complex IS TRUE) THEN 'complex.svg'::text WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 11) THEN vl_official_sign.img_ro WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 12) THEN vl_marker_type.img_ro WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = 13) THEN ((('mirror'::text || CASE WHEN (sign.fk_mirror_shape = 12) THEN '-circular'::text ELSE ''::text END) || CASE WHEN (NOT sign.mirror_red_frame) THEN '-noframe'::text ELSE ''::text END) || '.svg'::text) WHEN (sign.fk_sign_type = (_natural_direction_or_left_rectified = false)))) THEN '_right'::text ELSE ''::text END AS _img_direction FROM union_view uv;

table.name: vw_validation
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT ON (su.id) su.id, su.geometry, GREATEST(su._last_modification_date, a._last_modification_date, f._last_modification_date, si._last_modification_date) AS last_modification_date, (su.needs_validation OR a.needs_validation OR f.needs_validation OR si.needs_validation) AS needs_validation, su.needs_validation AS support_needs_validation, ( SELECT array_agg(a_1.id) AS array_agg FROM signalo_db.azimut a_1 WHERE ((a_1.fk_support = su.id) AND (a_1.needs_validation = true))) AS azimuts_need_validation, ( SELECT array_agg(f_1.id) AS array_agg FROM (signalo_db.frame f_1 JOIN signalo_db.azimut a_1 ON ((f_1.fk_azimut = a_1.id))) WHERE ((a_1.fk_support = su.id) AND (f_1.needs_validation = true))) AS frames_need_validation, ( SELECT array_agg(sgn.id) AS array_agg FROM ((signalo_db.sign sgn JOIN signalo_db.frame f_1 ON ((sgn.fk_frame = f_1.id))) JOIN signalo_db.azimut a_1 ON ((f_1.fk_azimut = a_1.id))) WHERE ((a_1.fk_support = su.id) AND (sgn.needs_validation = true))) AS signs_need_validation FROM (((signalo_db.support su LEFT JOIN ( SELECT azimut.id, azimut.fk_support, azimut.needs_validation, max(azimut._last_modification_date) OVER (PARTITION BY azimut.fk_support ORDER BY azimut.needs_validation DESC NULLS LAST) AS _last_modification_date FROM signalo_db.azimut) a ON ((a.fk_support = su.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT frame.id, frame.fk_azimut, frame.needs_validation, max(frame._last_modification_date) OVER (PARTITION BY frame.fk_azimut ORDER BY frame.needs_validation DESC NULLS LAST) AS _last_modification_date FROM signalo_db.frame) f ON ((f.fk_azimut = a.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sign.id, sign.fk_frame, sign.needs_validation, max(sign._last_modification_date) OVER (PARTITION BY sign.fk_frame ORDER BY sign.needs_validation DESC NULLS LAST) AS _last_modification_date FROM signalo_db.sign) si ON ((si.fk_frame = f.id)));
